channel.title: [PI]Donator not working properly?

item.title: [PI]Donator not working properly?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Clepto, post:1, topic:398856”]Hey, I made a donator int in my player.java.

I then went to playersave.java and put:

} else if (token.equals("donator")) {
p.donator = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and

characterfile.write("donator = ", 0, 7);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donator), 0 , Integer.toString(p.donator).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Then in the character save file, instead of being donator = 0. It puts Donator0, any help?[/quote]I dont see any space errors (maybe I just not looking at it right) try this one

} else if (token.equals("isDonator")) { p.isDonator = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("isDonator = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isDonator), 0, Integer.toString(p.isDonator).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Donator not working properly?
item.dc:creator: @Clepto Clepto
item.description:
@Clepto wrote:

Hey, I made a donator int in my player.java.

I then went to playersave.java and put:

} else if (token.equals("donator")) {
p.donator = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and

characterfile.write("donator = ", 0, 7);
characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donator), 0 , Integer.toString(p.donator).length());
characterfile.newLine();

Then in the character save file, instead of being donator = 0. It puts Donator0, any help?

Read full topic
